Detailed Description

Geometric data for the bound of an octree cell.

Constant.

Radius is that of the circumsphere.

Subcell numbering: 

    y z       6 7
    |/   2 3  4 5
     -x  0 1
in binary: 
    y z           110 111
    |/   010 011  100 101
     -x  000 001
